10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: Anas narrated that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"Make your rows solid and close together, and keep your necks in line. By the One in Whose Hand is the soul of Muhammad! I can see the shaitan entering through the gaps in the rows as if they are small sheep

chapter.ara-name: باب حَثِّ الإِمَامِ عَلَى رَصِّ الصُّفُوفِ وَالْمُقَارَبَةِ بَيْنَهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Imam encouraging (worshippers) to make the rows solid and stand close to one another
